titleStmt.title: A briefe epistle to the learned Manasseh Ben Israel. In answer to his, dedicated to the Parliament. September. 6. Imprimatur John Downame
titleStmt.author: Spencer, Edward, Sir, 1595-1656.

notesStmt.note: "Fratri suo spectatissimo Menasseh Ben Israel" has drop-head title with separate pagination and is in Latin; register is continuous.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
Identified by ESTC as Wing (CD-ROM, 1996) S4945A.
